posts.title: Blog and publish content (if you want)
posts.markdown:
This page exist to show you different ways to style and format your content. - See how this page was generated [here](http://firepress.org/blog/under-the-hood-part-1/). - You can see [Part Two here](http://firepress.org/blog/styling-and-formatting-examples-part-2/). --- ### Format your content When you edit your content in your Ghost editor, you actually use the **Markdown** format standard. Think about the format of these elements: - headers - bold - bulleted - lists - links - inserting a picture - etc. **Markdown** is designed to be an easy alternative to HTML. It allows everyone to publish web pages with no HTML experience. ### Bold, italic Who does not love putting **stuff in bold**... *you know what I mean*? ### Links Paste in a URL, like http://firepress.org/ and it will be automatically make it clickable. You can also customize how the text should be for any url. The FirePress home page can be found [here](http://firepress.org/). ### What about Images? Images work too! Already know the URL of the image you want to include in your article? Simply paste it in like this to make it show up: ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/theme-assets/master/professional-services/martine-nadal/images/martine-nadal.jpg) ### List, using bullet points - Item number one - Item number two - Sub item 2A - Sub item 2B - A final item ### List, using bullet points 1. Remember to buy some milk 2. Drink the milk - Sub item 2A - Sub item 2B 3. Tweet that I remembered to buy the milk, and drank it ### Quoting Our eyes can't help it, they love reading quotes! > At FirePress our mission is to help brands and entrepreneurs to build an outstanding mobile-first website. --- ### Need some space? Throw 3 dashes `---` on any new line and you've got yourself a fancy new divider. Aw yeah. --- ### Button Need a clear **Call to Action**? Buttons are your friends. Click Me >
There is many sizes and colors to choose from. See how to use them [here](http://firepress.org/blog/source-how-to-create-fancy-buttons-in-your-posts/) --- ### Embed a YouTube video *(Psst... Want to start a website just like this one? Request your [free 21-Day trial here](http://firepress.org/blog/sign-up-for-your-free-21-day-trial-at-firepress/))* ### Don't want the blog function? If you don't want to use the blog function of your website, **just remove the link from the navigation section**. This way your visitor will not be able to see it. ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/theme-assets/master/professional-services/martine-nadal/images/navigation-blog-d.jpg) ---
See how it was edited >
posts.html:
This page exist to show you different ways to style and format your content.

  • See how this page was generated here.
  • You can see Part Two here.

Format your content

When you edit your content in your Ghost editor, you actually use the Markdown format standard. Think about the format of these elements:

  • headers
  • bold
  • bulleted
  • lists
  • links
  • inserting a picture
  • etc.

Markdown is designed to be an easy alternative to HTML. It allows everyone to publish web pages with no HTML experience.

Bold, italic

Who does not love putting stuff in bold... you know what I mean?

Links

Paste in a URL, like http://firepress.org/ and it will be automatically make it clickable.

You can also customize how the text should be for any url. The FirePress home page can be found here.

What about Images?

Images work too! Already know the URL of the image you want to include in your article? Simply paste it in like this to make it show up:

List, using bullet points

  • Item number one
  • Item number two
    • Sub item 2A
    • Sub item 2B
  • A final item

List, using bullet points

  1. Remember to buy some milk
  2. Drink the milk
    • Sub item 2A
    • Sub item 2B
  3. Tweet that I remembered to buy the milk, and drank it

Quoting

Our eyes can't help it, they love reading quotes!

At FirePress our mission is to help brands and entrepreneurs to build an outstanding mobile-first website.

Need some space?

Throw 3 dashes --- on any new line and you've got yourself a fancy new divider. Aw yeah.

Button

Need a clear Call to Action? Buttons are your friends.

Click Me >

There is many sizes and colors to choose from. See how to use them here

Embed a YouTube video

(Psst... Want to start a website just like this one? Request your free 21-Day trial here)

Don't want the blog function?

If you don't want to use the blog function of your website, just remove the link from the navigation section. This way your visitor will not be able to see it.


See how it was edited >

posts.title: Services
posts.markdown:
### Let us help As a social media campaign ninja, we help businesses to focus their marketing efforts with dedication and passion. Our team is small, customer oriented and highly reactive. See us as your personal expert team for: - **Social networks** management - **Content** creation - **SEO** optimization - **Call To Action** to redirect your followers into a sell ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/theme-assets/master/professional-services/martine-nadal/images/production.jpg) ### Social networks nurturing Operate and execute the core of your business is taking all your time? This is not a reason to give up on social networks. Let our creative people do it for you! ### Pricing
‚óè Once a day
‚óè 5 days a week
‚óè Publish original content over 3 social networks
‚óè Billed each month
475$
### Testimonials *She said:* > I'm very impressed by what Martine did on my Instagram profile. I couldn't have made it without you! xoxx
‚Äî [Katy Perry](https://twitter.com/katyperry?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor)
*Then he said:* > What can I say that's not been said about Martine? She blowed my mind when we thought there was no solution. Bravissimo!
‚Äî [Walt Mossberg](http://www.theverge.com/users/WaltMossberg) *And then he said:* > This platform *plus a shitload of work* is a game changer. Period!
‚Äî [Gary Vee](https://www.facebook.com/gary/) *So she said:* > Working with Martine is a privilege. You rock!
‚Äî [Sara Salty](http://martinenadal.tk/news/services/) ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/theme-assets/master/professional-services/martine-nadal/images/animated-good-job.gif) --- *(Psst... Want to start a website just like this one? Request your [free 21-Day trial here](http://firepress.org/blog/sign-up-for-your-free-21-day-trial-at-firepress/))*

posts.html:
Let us help

As a social media campaign ninja, we help businesses to focus their marketing efforts with dedication and passion. Our team is small, customer oriented and highly reactive. See us as your personal expert team for:

  • Social networks management
  • Content creation
  • SEO optimization
  • Call To Action to redirect your followers into a sell

Social networks nurturing

Operate and execute the core of your business is taking all your time? This is not a reason to give up on social networks. Let our creative people do it for you!

tags.name: how-to
tags.description: A collection of articles to help you winning your challenges.
